reviewText: Great video, but $10 cheaper getting it directly from Anite Productions who publishes this video.

I have been viewing this since the 80s and while some things in the firearms industry changed since  the 80s the basic fundamentals don't change. For any kind of shooter this video should be mandatory viewing. Great douse of reality compared to movies and media portrayal of firearms.

Thinking of buying a first gun?

Buy this first.

Already own a gun?

Buy this now.

"Shoots " down some old myths,

is very informative,

and  fun to watch.
